nodes.text: Athelis Kallis  was a female Sith Pureblood living during the Galactic War. A rare non-Force-sensitive Pureblood in the reconstituted Sith Empire, she joined the Imperial Diplomatic Service and spend years researching the culture of Voss. In 3640 BBY she was approached by Sith Lord Kallig looking for the information on the Forbidden Ritual.
Athelis Kallis appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic during the Sith Inquisitor class mission on Voss. If the male Inquisitor attempts to flirt with her, she will reveal that she is happily married.
